data.title: France Lotto Results [2024 Winning Numbers]
data.meta_description: France lotto results are available on our website, every Monday, Wednesday and Saturday evenings. Get your France lotto r Plus winning numbers here.
data.text:
FRANCE LOTTO RESULTS

Welcome to all the South African French Lotto players. We take pride in delivering the most up-to-date Lotto French Results.

Results are organized from the last draw date and we show previous results for the current month all on one page. We also show the France lotto plus results for those looking at increasing their odds of winning.

Draws take place every Monday, Wednesday, and Saturday evening 21:00 PM (SAST). Draw times changes to 22:00 PM (SAST) from 31 October to 28 March due to daylight savings times.

Below you will find the latest lotto results in France for the Main draw and Plus Draw. You may also like our lotto french Historical results and Daily lotto results which you can find further down the page.

Results are updated as soon as they are released. Please bookmark this page for the latest results and updates.

FRANCE LOTTO RESULTS TODAY

SHARE WITH YOUR FRIENDS!

FRANCE LOTTO HISTORY RESULTS

FRENCH LOTTO

The French Lotto is one of the best lotos the country has produced. The lotto is run and operated by Francaise des Jeux (FDJ).

They are also the title sponsor of the FDJ Cycling Team. If you were to loosely translate Francaise des Jeux (FDJ), it means the French Company of Games. The company is owned by the French Government which owns about 72% of FDJ.

France Lotto is a popular lottery in France and South Africa. There are ten prize categories and the jackpot starts at EUR2 million. The winnings from the draw are tax-free and given in one lump sum.

The minimum guaranteed jackpot is EUR2 million and there is a maximum of 34 rollovers. The French lottery is a highly competitive game, its very similar to the Lunchtime results lottery. It is one of the biggest lotteries in Europe. The largest jackpot was won by a family from Val-d’Oise, with a prize of EUR24 million!

FRANCE LOTTO – HOW TO PLAY

Firstly, the French lotto is really quick, easy, and fun to play. To get started, choose 5 numbers between 1 – 49, and for the bonus ball, you have an option of 1 – 10.

If you pick correctly and all 6 balls match the lotto draw then you have won the jackpot.

Just a heads up, just like all other lotteries, the jackpot is shared amongst the players whose numbers match the French Lotto Draw.

HOW TO WIN THE FRANCE LOTTO

To stand a chance of winning the French Lotto, all five winning numbers have to be matched, including the bonus ball.Two Million euros is the minimum jackpot and and if the France Lotto Jackpot is not won, the next jackpot increases by one million Euros.

For a reduced price, players have the option of playing plus draw which increases your chances of winning the French Lotto Jackpot without the bonus ball.

COMBINATIONFRANCE LOTTO 5 + 12 million euros minimum5 + 0around 100,000 €4 + 1around € 1,0004 + 0around 400 €3 + 1around 50 €3 + 0around 20 €2 + 1around 10 €2 + 0around € 4.401 + 1€ 2.200 + 1€ 2.20

The table shows the winning ball combinations and how much a players stands to win by how much balls they match.

FRANCE LOTTO PLUS RESULTS

With the Plus draw, players have a 1 in 4 chance of winning the Jackpot. Think of it has having another chance with your same 5 numbers. The Jackpot however, for the plus draw has maximum payout of € 100,000. Below you will find a chart for the payouts for the Plus Draw.

COMBINATIONFRANCE LOTTO 5 vouchers€ 100,000 minimum4 vouchersaround 500 €3 vouchersaround 30 €2 vouchers€ 3

FRANCE LOTTO RESULTS HISTORY

Going through the France lotto history results can be very helpful when it comes to winning the lotto. You get to see certain number combinations, what are the most and least played lotto balls and what were the winning jackpot numbers.

We have History Results for the French lotto as far back as 2009. Below you will find quick links to all the years for the French lotto.

France Lotto Hot and Cold Numbers

Hot numbers are helpful when choosing your next draw numbers. It gives your a birds eye-view of the most commonly played numbers for the France Lotto. Below you will find a chart of the most commonly played numbers also known as Hot numbers.

FRANCE LOTTO HOT NUMBERSDRAW AMOUNT 41256132432224115232302310122616226292262622331223

FRANCE LOTTO PREDICTIONS

We don’t provide French lotto predictions on this website at this moment. This is something we might look into the future. For now we recommend that you have a look at the French Lotto Hot Numbers, Past History Results and our france lotto generator.

This should give you an indication of the most played numbers and our history results will help you to notice certain number patterns. Our number generator can be helpful in discovering new number patterns and see if they match up with played numbers in our history pages.

FRANCE LOTTO FAQ
